name: label
description: The label for the date search field.

name: headingLevel
description: The heading level which represents an element from `<h1>` through to `<h6>`.

name: headingSize
description: The physical size of the date search title (`xl`, `l`, `m`, `s` or `xs`).

name: id
description: A unique ID for the date search component.

name: name
description: The name of the form field.

name: hint
description: An optional hint to display above the form field.

name: error
description: If set, the details of any errors.

name: maxWidth
description: If true, make the date search field expand to the full width of the container.

name: formItemClasses
description: Classes to add to the date search form group.

name: formItemAttributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the date search form group.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the date search field.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the date search field.
